public class NoteList
extends java.util.ArrayList<Note>

NoteList contains a sequence of notes.

getFirstAudibleNote

public Note getFirstAudibleNote()

Returns:

fillMidiTrack

public void fillMidiTrack(javax.sound.midi.Track track,
                          Scale scale,
                          double startTime)
                   throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
Fills the given midi track with the notes from this NoteList.

Parameters:
track - the midi track to fill
scale - the scale to use
startTime - the time the first note should be played, in quarter notes
Throws:
javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - if there is any invalid midi data
